title: Cnr rao scholarship
content: Asking for a friend,as the fees for this year was 4,80,000 so for a pessat student the cnr rao should amount to 96,000 or do they give this scholarship on the basis of tution fee which would then amount in around 26k ?

comments.body: For 4.8L fees they will give you 96k as scholarship for CNR.
Each sem 96k or both sem including 96k

The CNR scholarship refunds 40% of your fees for a year, so 20% each sem (if you secure CNR in both the sems).
So each sem you will get 20% of 4.8L i.e., 96k.
